allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=rootroot psql -h localhost -U postgres -d schedule_website -f insert_test_sessions_final.sql)
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d schedule_website -f insert_test_sessions_final.sql)

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d schedulewebsite -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as teacher_count FROM teachers WHERE status = ''ACTIVE''; SELECT COUNT(*) as student_count FROM students WHERE status = ''ACTIVE''; SELECT COUNT(*) as subject_count FROM subjects; SELECT COUNT(*) as booth_count FROM booths WHERE status = true;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d schedulewebsite -c "SELECT teacher_id, name FROM teachers WHERE status = ''ACTIVE'' ORDER BY name;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d schedulewebsite -c "SELECT student_id, name FROM students WHERE status = ''ACTIVE'' ORDER BY name;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d schedulewebsite -c "SELECT subject_id, name FROM subjects ORDER BY name;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d schedulewebsite -c "SELECT start_time, end_time, COUNT(*) as count FROM class_sessions WHERE date = ''2025-08-03'' GROUP BY start_time, end_time ORDER BY start_time;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d schedulewebsite -c "SELECT start_time, end_time, COUNT(*) as sessions_count FROM class_sessions WHERE date = ''2025-08-03'' GROUP BY start_time, end_time ORDER BY start_time;")
